quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win. – Sun Tzu
fact: The first contraceptive was crocodile dung used by the ancient Egyptians.
joke: I dreamed about drowning in an ocean made out of orange soda last night. It took me a while to work out it was just a Fanta sea.
